q: Of Employment Agreement Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer This apparently did not sit well with Microsoft, and a complaint was filed with the Superior Court for damages and injunctive relief. In plain violation of his employment agreement with Microsoft, Miszewski has accepted employment with Microsoft's direct competitor Salesforce.com, reads the complaint,`` in a position that targets precisely the same market segment- government and public sector customers- that was Miszewski's area of responsibility while employed at Microsoft.'' executive chairman,`` a lot of my time'' will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said.`` We've got very complicated government issues,'' he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries.
